Articles.Content: I challenge you all to Fly your Shuttle or Rocket Plane on a Plane! Sounds easy right? Well, You have to place it on 20 small planes, Land on the North Pole And South Pole, Near the edge of the sea.. Of course, Its possible by struts, powerful engines, some practice, you can also use mods, such as MechJeb, or other cheat mods, but if you think this can be done without mods, or if it can be done with mods, post your success picture.

Can we see your attempt at doing so please? It would provide affirmation that said challenge is possible and feasible, plus it makes it look far more professional and will be taken far more seriously.

Here are some things missing from your challenge.

1. Logic (How do you put 1 shuttle on 20 tiny planes? The real Enterprise was carried by a Boeing 747.)

2. Clarification of the rules (What does "Land on the North Pole And South Pole, Near the edge of the sea" mean? Add specific points such as minimum length of flight, landing point, etc. or add a rank-based scoring system)

3. Your own attempt at doing it (proof that it can be done)

As for a Shuttle on a plane, go check out Inigma's Shuttle. One of the spinoff crafts is a Shuttle on a 747 lookalike.

Easy on the new poster, folks.

Welcome aboard, SlideTheBoat. Have a look at the Challenge Submissions Guide, it can really help you flesh out your challenge so it attracts more entries.
